title: eac3to dts hd decoding Arcsoft files and examples included - Ofe
description:
Please leave feedback!

Info:

checkactivate.dll comes from a TotalMedia Theatre 2 trial version, all others are from a TotalMedia Theatre 6.5.1.150 install


Instructions:

1.  Copy the following files from the included Arcsoft folder to your eac3to directory.  There should be 8 (eight)

ASAudioHD.ax

checkactivate.dll

DtsDec.dll

dtsdecoderdll.dll

MagCore.dll

MagPCMac.dll

MagUIEngine.dll

MagUIInter.dll


2.  Run cmd.exe as administrator then cd to your eac3to directory and type, regsvr32 ASAudioHD.ax

Alternatively, simply type, regsvr32 "drive_here:path_to_eac3to_hereASAudioHD.ax"

You should get a successfull confirmation pop-up from Windows


3.  Type, eac3to -test

Alternatively, simply type, "drive_here:path_to_eac3to_hereeac3to.exe" -test


Arcsoft decoder should show as being available to eac3to


4.  Right click and edit included batch files.  Simply fill in pathing/file naming/bitrate info
